body_html:
looks like you have serval different version of cuda installed in your system.
Use
sudo apt-get purge cuda-.
remove all cuda first and then install the 8.0 from the local deb file.
also looks like you have some linkage broken with the dpkg that causing you failing the apt-get update,
you should go to setting/Software&Update/other software to clean your source list, especially remove those who are failing.

body:
looks like you have serval different version of cuda installed in your system.
Use
`sudo apt-get purge cuda-.`
remove all cuda first and then install the 8.0 from the local deb file.
also looks like you have some linkage broken with the dpkg that causing you failing the apt-get update,
you should go to setting/Software&Update/other software to clean your source list, especially remove those who are failing.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/12994633/20282052/f0a701b2-aa67-11e6-9a4f-608feb9f8490.png)
